name: Monster Twins
description:
This is a puzzle platformer game I made back in 2015 for Ludum Dare 33. Theme was "You are a monster". Your mission is to control two monsters simutaneously, get keys to open doors and then go through doors. One of the monsters has gravity flipped, which makes it bit more interesting.

Controls: WASD-keys or arrows.

Tips(SPOILERS: ONLY READ IF YOU GET STUCK!):

Don't go through doors before you got both keys.

Your monster dies if a block falls over it, so be careful.

Sometimes you need to de-align monsters so they move bit separately.

Moving backwards while jumping might help.
